name: RumbleParty
description:
RumbleParty is a local-multiplayer party game.

In this game, you can enjoy 4 different game mode.

Let's fun!

Who we are?

We are 6BySixGames, a development team of 6 students from Longhwa University of Science and Technology.

This is the graduation project of our 37th Overseas Youth Technical Training Course, and our department is "Animation and Game Design and Production".

Note : Before you start, you should setup a joystick for each player, total 4 joysticks.
